name: Wizard's Struggle
description:
This is an entry for the Game Off 2022 and this is the first ever Game Jam I've entered.

I entered this Game Jam with Lamorak and FerWar6

Our cliché is "At the end of the day the hero saves the girl".

Who did what?

  • ItsKevin183:
  • Made everything in Unity
  • Designed the level
  • Ferdinand:
  • Drew all of the Pixel Art 
  • Made the movement with ItsKevin183 in Unity
  • Lamorak:
  • Additional Art
  • Made the SFX and OST (Link to his SoundCloud)         
    •        

What's the game about?

  • Wizard's Struggle is a challenging game that is easy to learn, but hard to master! 
  • The game is 2 - ∞ hours long, the average time for the playtesters to finish was 4h.
  • If you fall you will lose most of your progress.
  • Can you save the princess?

Controls

Movement:

A = Left

D = Right

Indicator:

Left Arrow Key = Indicator Left

Right Arrow Key = Indicator Right

Jumping:

Spacebar = Jump (Hold to increase height)

Spacebar Mid Air = Double Jump

Other Controls:

R = Reset (Restarts the game/level so you can attempt a new run)

Esc = Pause Menu

Install guide:

1. Download the game/folder

2. Extract the folder

3. Enjoy!
